```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r read in data, echo=F}
ces <- read_csv(here("data","ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces) +
  geom_hex(aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  labs( x = "White %",
        y = "CES 3.0 score")
```
